author: Staff Reporter
text:
A three-member gang robbed an aged couple of 21 sovereigns of jewels and Rs. 60,000 at Nilakottai near here on Sunday night.

A retired teacher, Durai Raja (79), and his wife Gnanamani (69) were sleeping at their residence at Meenakshipuram when the gang entered their house through the back door.

The robber tied the couple with a rope at knifepoint, and took away the cash and the jewels kept in an almirah. Vilampatti police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Gang robs couple of jewels, cash
